email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280m. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $50.75 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s specifications and availability? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I understand your concern about the rate. Given our long-standing relationship, I can offer $51.25 per metric ton. The MV Ocean Star is fully compliant with all regulations and is currently in the Gulf of Mexico, ready for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton. Please confirm the laycan of 15-20 October and provide the demurrage terms. Also, could you send over the vessel’s full specs for our records? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that $51.25 per metric ton works for you. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ve attached the full vessel specifications for your review. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment - Confirmation
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $51.25 per metric ton. Please send over the contract for review and signature. Thanks for your assistance. Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment - Contract
email_chain.body: Hi John, I’ve attached the contract for your review. Please sign and return it at your earliest convenience. Looking forward to a smooth operation. Best regards, Sarah.
